description.en: GoByte is the fastest, most secure & most affordable Proof-of-Work cryptocurrency in the world. Its network features instantly settled & respendable transactions, 51% attack immunity, optionally private transactions and the first decentralized blockchain governance and self-funding model through incentivized full nodes which enable mass adoption scaling.

‚ö†Ô∏è Attention everyone. ‚ö†Ô∏è Please withdraw all your GBX from the Coinomi wallet by 28 September. 
You can transfer the funds, or export the private keys by using their tutorial at https://bit.ly/3kD5dvp and then import them into the GoByte Core wallet v0.12.2.4 which you can download here: https://github.com/gobytecoin/gobyte/releases/

üë®‚Äçüîß GoByte Community Announcement üë®‚Äçüîß

The highly anticipated v0.12.3.4 of the GoByte Core wallet is now out on the public testnet.
As you already know, GoByte is a PoW blockchain, hence we are looking for testnet miners.
We are as well looking for testnet masternode operators that can set up, operate and maintain a v0.12.3.4 masternode on the public testnet network.
If you are willing to assist, please join our GoByte Nation discord server for more details. https://discord.gg/kFvetYW
